review:
I have heard about the doctor sujata from my mother & sister that she is very experienced * **** ******* they came for urine infection treatment & they are feeling relief but i never seen her treatment. but now im suffering from "PCOD" problem so after discussing from mother i have visited & i felt that dr. behavior is very friendly. sorry but now i cant say more about my treatment experience bcz that was my 1st visit when I'll get read of from my problems then I'll say more. 
i wanna give 9/10 to Dr. sujata.

Thank you.
